mapper.select:
select id, student_id as studentId, student_name as studentName, student_pay as studentPay, student_enroll as studentEnroll, student_photo as studentPhoto, gender, class_name as className, student_status as studentStatus, is_delete as isDelete, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from t_student_info
is_delete = 0
and student_name like concat('%',#{studentName},'%')
and student_enroll like concat('%',#{studentEnroll},'%')
and class_name like concat('%',#{className},'%')
and student_status = #{studentStatus}
order by id desc limit #{dataNum}, #{limit};
